text: hi my name is Luna I'm 11 and this is a
story of the time I grew a
garden this year in science class I
learned all about vegetable gardening
and I couldn't wait to try it at home my
mom gave me a little plot of land in her
own backyard and we called it Luna's
Farm I planted tomatoes peppers
cucumbers and all kinds of herbs I
remember from science class that a
garden needs plenty of sunshine and that
I had to keep my plants watered I also
knew that plants won't grow if they're
crowded by weeds before I knew it the
seats started sprouting every week my
plants were getting bigger and bigger
and a few months the vegetables are ripe
and ready after I picked the vegetables
I made a salad with all the things I
grew all by myself and was really good M
yummy I'm going to make a garden every
year because nothing tastes better than
the vegetables you goow
yourself you just watched a TTI on
Disney Channel
